alreadyMember: This user is already a member of the group
name-property-min-characters: Property name must have at least 3 characters
name-property-max-characters: Property name must have a maximum of 50 characters
register-name-min: Name must contain at least 3 characters
register-name-max-characters: Name must contain a maximum of 20 characters.
register-surname-min-characters: Last name must contain at least 3 characters.
register-surname-max-characters: Last name must contain a maximum of 40 characters.
username-min: Username must contain at least 3 characters.
username-max: Username must contain a maximum of 20 characters.
password-min: Password must contain at least 6 characters.
password-lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
password-uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
password-number: Password must contain at least one number.
password-special: Password must contain at least one special character.
delete-property: Are you sure you want to delete this property?
alert-property: Note: Deleting the property will affect all associated projects or tasks. Please be aware that this action is irreversible and may result in the loss of important data.
didn't-receive: Did you not receive any email?
verify-code: Enter the code sent to your email
want-leave: Are you sure you want to log out?
no-tasks-trash: It seems that this project has no deleted tasks
name: Name
dark-mode-configs: By enabling this option, you will switch your theme to dark mode. Another way to do it is by clicking on the moon or sun icon at the top of the page.
google-calendar-configs: Sync your Google Calendar events with our calendar for a complete view of your schedule. Streamline your organization and time management!
language-config-desc: Choose which language you want to use on the website.
general-config-desc: Here you will find some settings that cover the entire application!
accessibility-config-desc: Taskflow is designed to be inclusive and accessible to all users, regardless of their skills or needs. That's why we offer several features that guarantee a complete and pleasant experience for everyone!
text-size-config-desc: Choose the size of the text that best suits your needs.
preferences-config-desc: Here you can customize your experience with Taskflow according to your preferences!
property-name-config-desc: Defines whether the property name will be displayed or not.
property-data-config-desc: Choose by which type of date property you want to see your tasks for the day on the Home Page.
color-config-desc: Choose the color of your theme using the default colors or make one according to your preference.
tutorial-config-desc: If you need help, you can always access our tutorial to learn how to use Taskflow.
delete-account-desc: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
delete-account-desc-recovery: You can still recover your account for 1 month after deleting it, after which it is deleted forever!
notification-task-desc: Receive notifications whenever a task is modified, created, or removed from your projects to stay up-to-date.
notification-permission-desc: Whenever there is a change to your permissions in a project, you will receive a notification and be informed about which permission was modified.
notification-scheduling-desc: When you schedule a task or project on our platform, you will be notified of any changes, creations, or deletions of tasks related to your projects.
notification-comments-desc: When a task in a project you are part of receives a comment, you will be notified immediately.
notification-group-desc: When you are removed of a group, you will receive a notification to be aware of the remotion.
notification-points-desc: When you reach a certain score in our system, you will receive a notification to stay informed about your progress.
notification-deadline-desc: When the due date for a project or task is approaching, you will be alerted to ensure that you can closely monitor and meet all important deadlines.
notification-messages-desc: When you receive any messages in your chats, you will be notified immediately.
redo-tutorial-config-desc: Are you sure you want to redo the tutorial? This will reset your progress and start you from the beginning.
dark-mode-configs-config: By enabling this option, you will switch your theme to dark mode. Another way to do it is by clicking on the moon or sun icon at the top of the page.
no-properties-date: There are no 'Date' properties in the project
no-properties-select: There are no 'Select' properties in the project
no-tasks-in-project: There are no tasks in this project

log-update-name-task: The task's name was updated by '{{username}}'
log-update-project: The project's '{{propertyname}}' property was updated to '{{propertyvalue}}' by '{{username}}'
log-update-name-project: The project's name was updated by '{{username}}'
log-owner-project: The project's owner was updated to '{{username}}'
log-description-project: The project's description was updated by '{{username}}'
log-picture-project: The project's picture was updated by '{{username}}'
notification-permission: Your permission was updated in the project '{{aux}}'
notification-rmv-group: You have been removed from the group '{{aux}}'
notification-add-group: You have received an invitation to join the group '{{aux}}'
notification-comment: Some people commented on the task '{{aux}}'
notification-deadline: The task '{{aux}}' is nearing its deadline
notification-schedule: The task '{{aux}}' is nearing its schedule
notification-points: You have passed the goal of {{aux}} points
no-possible-users: No users associated with this project
notification-invite: Your group have been invited to join the project '{{aux}}'
request-complete-task: There was a request to complete the task, do you want to complete it?
file-size-exceeded: File size exceeds the allowed limit!
value-max-time-property: The value has reached the property's maximum time!
no-tasks-in-page: There are no tasks in this page
no-page-conected: There are no pages connected to this page
text-info: A text property is a text field that can be filled with any information you want. You can define a maximum character size and other settings.
archive-info: An archive property is a field that allows the upload of files of any type. You can define the maximum file size and other settings.
number-info: A number property is a field that only accepts numbers. You can define a maximum value, among other settings.
date-info:
A date property is a field that only accepts dates. 
 - Scheduling/Deadline: helps the system generate notifications and tasks to be displayed on the home page. 
 - Can Be Pass: defines whether the date value can be in the past. 
 - Include Hours: defines whether the date will include time.
select-info: A select property is a field that allows the choice of one option among several. You can define the available options and other settings.
user-info: A user property is a field that allows the choice of one or more users. You can define a maximum number of users and other settings.
tag-info: A tag property is a field that allows the choice of one or more tags. You can define the tag options and other settings.
checkbox-info: A checkbox property is a field that allows the choice of one or more options. You can define the available options and other settings.
radio-info: A radio property is a field that allows the choice of one option among several. You can define the available options and other settings.
progress-info: A progress property is a field that allows the choice of a numeric value. You can define a maximum value and other settings.
time-info: A time property is basically a stopwatch. You can define a maximum time and other settings.
kanban-info: Kanban is a visual management tool that allows you to visualize the workflow and status of each task. It consists of columns representing the stages of the process and cards representing the tasks.
calendar-info: The Calendar is a tool that allows you to view scheduled tasks on a calendar. It is ideal for visualizing deadlines and appointments in an organized and practical way.
timeline-info: The Timeline is a tool that allows you to view tasks on a timeline. It is ideal for visualizing the progress of a project and the tasks that are in progress.
table-info: The Table is a tool that allows you to view tasks in a table format. It is ideal for viewing tasks in an organized and detailed manner.
list-info: The List is a tool that allows you to view tasks in a list format. You can see tasks from other pages in a specific order by connecting the pages to the list page.
canvas-info: The Canvas is a tool that allows you to view tasks in a canvas format. It is ideal for viewing tasks in a creative and innovative way.
delete-comment: Do you really want to delete this comment?
Do you really want to delete this comment?
tuto-step1: This is the home page. Here you can see today's tasks and the projects you are involved in.
tuto-step2: This is the header of our website. Here, you can perform some simple settings, such as theme and language, as well as access our chat, settings, and view notifications when they exist.
tuto-step3: In this button, you can open the sidebar navigation.
tuto-step4: This is our simplified sidebar. When you are inside a project, it will have more options. For now, you can see projects, groups, and your home page.
tuto-step5: This is the sidebar for your groups, the groups you own or are a part of.
tuto-step6: This is the group page. Here you can view and edit group information (if you are the owner), as well as view other members of this group.
tuto-step7: This is the projects page, where you can register new projects and view and filter existing ones. Let's create a project!
tuto-step8: This is the project page. Here you can view and edit, if you are the project owner, the information of this project.
tuto-step9: By clicking on this button, you can open the project control panel and view some charts related to it.
tuto-step10: In this section, you can view the project logs.
tuto-step12: And here are the properties valued in the project.
tuto-step13: Here are the project properties that would be valued in the tasks, that is, the final value would be assigned task by task. If you are on a page, you can see the page properties along with the project properties.
tuto-step14: Here are the project pages. You can create new pages and view and edit existing ones.
tuto-step15: Here are your account settings. You can change your information, preferences, and notifications.
tuto-step16: To add a user to the group, enter the user's name in the search field and click on this button
tuto-step17: After typing the user's name, click here to send the group invitation.
you-are-owner: You have projects or groups where you are the owner, and they are assigned to other users as well. To prevent others from losing access to them, you need to change the owner of your projects/groups to someone else.
organization-freedom: The organization that sets you free!
mission-statement: Our mission is to simplify task management, empowering teams with innovative and collaborative solutions. We value continuous improvement in everything we do.
changing-world: In a constantly changing world, at TaskFlow, we aspire to lead by example. Our vision is to be a benchmark for quality and innovation, always promoting the well-being of our users.
commitment-to-excellence: At TaskFlow, we are committed to excellence in every aspect of our work. Our fundamental principle is the relentless pursuit of quality in all our actions.
page-not-found: The page you are trying to access does not exist or has been removed.
forbidden: You do not have permission to access this page.
other-error: Something went wrong while trying to access this page.
complete-platform: With TaskFlow, you get a complete platform to manage your tasks, offering various views including Canvas, Timeline, Kanban, and Calendar. This gives you the flexibility to choose the best approach to optimize your productivity and organization.
total-control: In TaskFlow, you have total control over the permissions of each team member. Our highly customizable options ensure effective and secure collaboration. Easily adapt to your team's needs, ensuring a tailored experience for your workflow.
complete-communication: Our platform offers a complete communication experience, allowing individual and group conversations with file sharing, text, images, and more. Simplify collaboration and keep your team connected and productive.
properties-importance: Properties are fundamental in our system, providing important values for projects and tasks by categorizing, organizing, and detailing crucial information for activity completion.
tasks-description: Tasks are units of work within a project, assignable, monitorable, and updatable to ensure transparency, accountability, and continuous progress towards objectives.
platform-focus: Our platform is focused on projects that group tasks. Each project has specific objectives, deadlines, and resources, promoting a collaborative approach to goals.
taskFlow-intro: With TaskFlow, you can organize your daily tasks, manage complex projects, and collaborate efficiently with teams. Whether you're an individual seeking more organization or a company looking to optimize your processes, we're here to help. Try it now and discover how we can transform the way you work and organize!
no-chat-opened: Start a chat with someone to start talking!
no-possible-chats-create: There are no chats to create!
property-max: This property has a maximum of
property-not-past: This property cannot be in the past!
font-config-desc: Choose a font style for your text, personalize your experience according to your personal preferences.
beginning-conversation: This is the beginning of your conversation with
authenticate-configs: By activating two-way authentication, you give your account more security, as in addition to your password, you will need a code that will be sent to your email that only you have access to.
timeline-scroll: Scroll the mouse to zoom in or out
timeline-scroll-desc: Hover over the timeline to increase or decrease the interval between each section of the timeline.
confirm-username-change: Are you sure you want to change your username?
username-not-match: The username does not match the current one
confirm-password-change: Are you sure you want to change your password?
timeline-scroll: Scroll the mouse to zoom in or out
timeline-scroll-desc: Hover over the timeline to increase or decrease the interval between each section of the timeline.
have-sure-delete-permanently: Are you sure you want to delete this permanently?
some-user-in-project-desc: Someone from this group already has access to this project, which could result in permission conflicts, so you cannot add this group.
some-user-in-project: Someone is already in the project
Someone is already in the project

tuto-step-group-create: Click here to create a new group
tuto-back-sidebar: Click here to go back to the sidebar
tuto-projects-page-open: Now, click here to open the projects page
tuto-project-create: Click here to create a new project
tuto-create-property: Click here to open the properties sidebar
tuto-open-pages: Click here to open the pages sidebar
tuto-create-page: Click here to create a new page
tuto-created-page: This is the page you created, now you can create tasks on it
tuto-create-task: Click here, now there will be an option to create a task
